synopsis.text:
School ed in the mysteries of the past, Taisei Oonari, a second-year junior high student, embarks on a quest to unravel the enigma surrounding his vanished older sister. Enrolling at Shinkai Gakuen Middle School, he finds himself in the epicenter of a world threatened by a long-dormant, elusive foe: the Unknown.

In response to this looming menace, the Evolutionary Railway Development Agency (ERDA) has engineered an ingenious defense mechanism: the Shinkalion, a remarkable robot with the ability to transform into a bullet train. As fate would have it, Taisei discovers his innate aptitude as a Shinkalion pilot, propelling him into a battle he never anticipated.

As the Unknown resurfaces after a decade of silence, Taisei must confront the truth behind this formidable adversary and its true intentions. Amidst the chaos and uncertainty, the journey of self-discovery and unwavering determination unfolds, as Taisei and his peers strive to protect their world and uncover the secrets that lie beneath the surface.
